item.title: Here is some LaTeX
item.description: Here is some ## \LaTeX ##. $$ i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t} \Psi(\mathbf{r},t) = \left [ \frac{-\hbar^2}{2\mu}\nabla^2 + V(\mathbf{r},t)\right ] \Psi(\mathbf{r},t) $$ The quadratic formula $$ x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a} $$ Cross product $$ \mathbf{V}_1 \times \mathbf{V}_2 = \begin{pmatrix} \mathbf{i} & \mathbf{j} & \mathbf{k} \\ \frac{\partial X}{\partial u} & \frac{\partial Y}{\partial u} & 0 \\ \frac{\partial X}{\partial v} & \frac{\partial Y}{\partial v} & 0 \end{pmatrix} $$ Matrices (note verts and double verts don’t work and square brackets dont look right).

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: What data do we collect? We collect technical data such as your IP address and the type of device and web browser you are using. We use this information to help maintain and improve our website. What data do we not collect? We do not collect any personal data, and we do not use cookies. Privacy policies of other websites Our website contains links to other websites. Our privacy policy applies only to our website, so if you click on a link to another website, you should read their privacy policy.
